title: School Spirit Day
description: R.I.P. DayPhobias DayUrban Legends DayHolidays Day4 Spirit Week days.4 ways to die.Four high school classmates are determined to throw the scariest Halloween party anyone has ever been to. What better place to have it than at one of the most haunted schools in the country: Christopher High School. Sadly for them, it’s not only Halloween now, it’s Spirit Week, too, and someone or something starts picking them off one by one before the party can even start. Will any of them make it out alive, or succumb to Spirit Week?
author: Alshia Moyez
